member.name: N:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO
member.summary: The namespace contains the interfaces and classes used to set properties on the ADO enumerator.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADOEnumerationType
member.summary: Describes the objects that are the subject of the enumeration.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADOEnumerationType.EnumerateAllRows
member.summary: When the variable contains a dataset, this setting enumerates all the rows in all the tables in the dataset. When the variable contains a datatable, this setting enumerates all the rows in the table. When it contains a recordset, it enumerates all the rows in the recordset.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADOEnumerationType.EnumerateRowsInFirstTable
member.summary: When the variable contains a dataset, this setting enumerates all the rows in the first table in the dataset. When the variable contains a data table, it enumerates all rows in the table. When it contains a recordset, it enumerates all the rows in the recordset.

member.name: F:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADOEnumerationType.EnumerateTables
member.summary: When the variable contains a dataset, this setting enumerates all the tables in the dataset. When the variable contains a datatable, it raises an error at runtime. When it contains a recordset, it enumerates all the rows in the recordset.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADORowsetEnumerator
member.summary: Supports iteration over an ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) recordset. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADORowsetEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection. Returns a Boolean indicating whether the was successful.
member.returns: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator went past the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADORowsetEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ADORowsetEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current field collection from the enumerator.
member.returns: The current field collection object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.DataColEnumerator
member.summary: This class is used when the ADO enumerator returns a Dataset or Recordset. This enumerator allows you to enumerate over the columns. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.DataRowEnumerator
member.summary: Supports iteration when the is set to return , and the variable contains a data set. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.DataRowEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection. Returns a Boolean indicating whether the was successful.
member.returns: true if the enumerator was successfully advanced to the next element; false if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.DataRowEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.DataRowEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Gets the current element in the collection.
member.returns: The current element in the collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.EmptyEnumerator
member.summary: Acts as a placeholder when enumeration is called on an empty collection. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.EmptyEnumerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.EmptyEnumerator.MoveNext
member.summary: Advances the enumerator to the next element of the collection. The always returns false for this method.
member.returns: false because there is no item to move to.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.EmptyEnumerator.Reset
member.summary: Sets the enumerator to its initial position, which is before the first element in the collection.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.EmptyEnumerator.Current
member.summary: Raises an error indicating an empty enumerator.
member.returns: An object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.FieldColEnumerator
member.summary: This class is used when the ADO enumerator returns a Dataset or Recordset. This enumerator allows you to enumerate over the fields. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ForEachADOEnumerator
member.summary: Enumerates over rows in a dataset, data table, or recordset. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Dts.Runtime.Enumerators.ADO.ForEachADOEnumerator.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Returns an IEnumerator interface that can iterate over the ActiveX Data Objects (ADO) object.
member.returns: An object.
member.param: An object that implements the interface.
An object that implements the interface.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates what type of object to enumerate over.
